about_the_game:
The contents of this DLC are as follows:

---------------------------------------------------
[Category : Ambition in Epic Store]
- Automation [Ascension] (30000 EC)
- Automation [Craft Upgrade] (10000 EC)
- Automation [Treasure Chest] (20000 EC)

[Category : QoL4 in Epic Store]
- Spirit Preset [Routine] (3000 EC)
- Spirit Preset [Craft] (3000 EC)
- Craft Preset (10000 EC)

[Category : Ticket in Epic Store]
- Ticket [Super Reincarnation] (8500 EC)

[Category : Other]
- Red Ball + 1
--------------------------------- Equivalent to a total of 84500 EC

We have carefully selected powerful QoL and Automations and packed them into this DLC! It includes the ultimate automation, such as Ascension automation, and the game will continue to progress just by looking at it.

Note:
- In the Epic Store, you can purchase premium items and useful QoL with the in-game currency Epic Coin.
- If you already purchased the QoL in this DLC, the Epic Coin for that QoL will be returned.
ex.) If you already purchased "Automation [Ascension]" in Ambition of Epic Store before, and purchased this DLC, then you will gain its contents except for "Automation [Ascension]", and also additionally 30000 Epic Coin.
- The number of red balls increase from the beginning of the game. In addition, the effect of Nitro is applied.
- Ticket is single-use item.
- It stacks with other DLC.

--------------------------------- Equivalent to a total of 84500 EC

We have carefully selected powerful QoL and Automations and packed them into this DLC! It includes the ultimate automation, such as Ascension automation, and the game will continue to progress just by looking at it.

Note:

ex.) If you already purchased "Automation [Ascension]" in Ambition of Epic Store before, and purchased this DLC, then you will gain its contents except for "Automation [Ascension]", and also additionally 30000 Epic Coin.
- The number of red balls increase from the beginning of the game. In addition, the effect of Nitro is applied.

- It stacks with other DLC.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6
  • Processor: CPU Penguin 4 or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
